settings.title: Speciality Coffee Glossary
settings.content:
Welcome to Counter Culture's Specialty Coffee Glossary! At heart, CCC is about education: demystifying coffee, brewing, and sourcing in a frank, compassionate, nuanced way. A glossary is education in its purest form. This is a living, breathing resource that we'll constantly be updating.

Want to suggest a glossary term? Email us.

settings.title: Roasting & Harvesting
settings.description: Countries with two harvests per year can be in two different stages during the same month. For example, Colombia in November can be beginning to harvest their Mitaca harvest (mid-year), while we begin to roast their first harvest.
